snippet: Gov. Jan Brewer appealed the federal government’s decision to deny a major disaster declaration for the village of Yarnell, damaged in a wildfire that also killed 19 firefighters in June.
abstract: Arizona Gov Jan Brewer appeals federal government decision to deny major disaster declaration for village Yarnell, which was heavily damaged in wildfire that also killed 19 firefighters.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jan Brewer appealed the federal government’s decision to deny a major disaster declaration for the village of Yarnell, damaged in a wildfire that also killed 19 firefighters in June.
